title: Baritone Action Output Schema
description: Schema defining the structure of Baritone's intended action output (Y for training).

move_direction.description: The primary direction of planar movement.

look_change.description: Relative change in look direction from the current look_direction.

yaw.description: Change in yaw (horizontal rotation) in degrees.

pitch.description: Change in pitch (vertical rotation) in degrees.

jump.description: Whether the jump action is being performed.

sneak.description: Whether the sneak (crouch) action is being toggled/held.

sprint.description: Whether the sprint action is being toggled/held.
